src:
Pemprov DKI Jakarta Sediakan Kapal Cepat di Kepulauan Seribu
07 Nov 2019, 21:31 by Pemprov DKI Jakarta, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Pemprov DKI Jakarta telah menambahkan armada kapal antarpulau sebanyak 6 unit kapal cepat menuju Kepulauan Seribu. (Foto: Pemprov DKI Jakarta)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Gubernur Provinsi DKI Jakarta Anies BaswedanÂ telah menjalankan 14 program unggulan selama dua tahun pemerintahannya, salah satunya mewujudkan aksesibilitas di Kepulauan Seribu.Bupati Administrasi Kepulauan Seribu Husein Murad membenarkan pemerintah telah menyediakan fiber speedboat untuk mendukung keterjangkauan masyarakat di wilayah tersebut."Pemprov DKI Jakarta telah menambahkan armada kapal antarpulau sebanyak 6 unit kapal cepat fiber speed boat," ujar Husein melalui keterangannya, Kamis (7/11).Husein melanjutkan, kapal-kapal tersebut melayani 6 rute utama Kepulauan Seribu, seperti Muara Angke-Untung Jawa-Lancang (PP)-Tidung sebanyak 2 kali sehari. Kemudian Muara Angke-Pari-Pramuka (PP) 2 kali sehari, dengan tarif Rp 40.000 - Rp 70.000.Bahkan kapal antarpulau itu menyediakan berbagai fasilitas dan keunggulan di dalamnya."Ada toilet, TV, AC, kursi sesuai tiket pemesanan, sistem keamanan, serta akses disabilitas. Selain itu, jangka waktu perjalanan pun lebih cepat. Perjalanan dari Pulau Sebira ke Jakarta Utara yang biasanya ditempuh dalam waktu 8 jam, saat ini perjalanannya bisa dipangkas menjadi 2,5 jam saja.Peduli Kesejahteraan Selain menyediakan enam unit kapal cepat fiber speed boat demi kelancaran aksesibilitas masyarakat Kepulauan Seribu, Pemprov DKI Jakarta juga menghadirkan JakGrosir. Tempat belanja grosir tersebut disediakan untuk menyamaratakan harga bahan pangan di Kepulauan Seribu agar sama dengan di daratan Jakarta.Direktur Utama Perumda Pasar Jaya Arief Nasrudin berharap melalui JakGrosir diharapkan pedagang di Kepulauan Seribu bisa mendapatkan barang dengan harga murah dan bersaing, sehingga masyarakat bisa membeli barang dengan harga terjangkau. Hal ini pun turut mendukung terkendalinya inflasi di ibu kota."Dengan beroperasinya JakGrosir di Pulau Tidung Kecil ini, kebutuhan pangan murah untuk pulau-pulau yang ada di seluruh Kepulauan Seribu juga akan disalurkan dari sana. Ke depannya, JakGrosir bisa hadir di wilayah atau pulau lainnya di Kepulauan Seribu," ujar Arief. (asa)
text:
DKI Jakarta Provincial Government Provides Fast Boat in Thousand Islands
07 Nov 2019, 21:31 by DKI Jakarta Provincial Government, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


The DKI Jakarta Provincial Government has added 6 inter-island fleets of fast boats to the Thousand Islands. (Photo: DKI Jakarta Provincial Government)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Governor of DKI Jakarta Province Anies Baswedan has carried out 14 flagship programs during his two years of administration, one of which is to realize accessibility in the Thousand Islands. The Thousand Islands Administration Regent Husein Murad confirmed that the government has provided fiber speedboats to support the affordability of people in the region. "DKI Jakarta Provincial Government has added 6 inter-island fleets of fiber speed boat," Husein said through his statement on Thursday (11/7). Husin continued, the ships served 6 main routes of the Thousand Islands, such as Muara Angke-Untung Jawa-Lancang (PP) -Tidung 2 times a day. Then Muara Angke-Pari-Pramuka (PP) 2 times a day, at a rate of Rp 40,000 - Rp 70,000. Even the inter-island ship provides various facilities and advantages in it. "There are toilets, TVs, air conditioners, seats according to ticket reservations, security systems, as well as disability access In addition, the travel period is even faster: The trip from Sebira Island to North Jakarta, which is usually taken within 8 hours, currently the trip can be cut to 2.5 hours. Welfare Concern Besides providing six units of fast fiber ships speed boat for the sake of smooth accessibility of the Thousand Islands community, the Provincial Government of DKI Jakarta also presents JakG Wholesale, a wholesaler shopping place provided to equalize the price of food in the Thousand Islands to be the same as in mainland Jakarta. One thousand can get goods at cheap and competitive prices, so that people can buy b affordable charcoal. This also supports inflation control in the capital city. "With the operation of JakGrosir on Tidung Kecil Island, cheap food needs for islands throughout the Thousand Islands will also be distributed from there. Going forward, JakGrosir can be present in the region or island. other in the Thousand Islands, "said Arief. (hope)
